text: 2:14 2 Atriviba 2:8Egha a Elaijan korotiar ruarir kam inigha, Elaija faragha amizɨ moghɨn dɨpam mɨsoke. Egha a dɨpam mɨsozir dughiamɨn, a ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir God, a Elaijan God, a managh iti? A ti uaghan, na ko ikiam?” Ezɨ dɨpam zuamɨra bigha akuar pumuningɨn otozɨ, Elisa uamategha vongɨn ize.
